name: Hell is Other Demons - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Hell is Other Demons! It features 11 rich synthwave tracks from Rémi Gallego of The Algorithm. Each track is available as a high quality wav file and the DLC also includes the album cover art.

The full track listing for the soundtrack is below:

1. Ruins - 3:19
2. Curse of the Moon - 2:49
3. Infernal Affairs - 4:03
4. Judgment - 3:14
5. Death Pamphlet - 3:19
6. Blood Stain - 3:30
7. Sorrows - 4:44
8. The Lament Before the Storm - 0:59
9. The Oppressor - 2:28
10. Infernal Gateway I - 1:05
11. Infernal Gateway II - 1:25
